name: boxarr
description: Boxarr provides an easy-to-use web UI for managing Docker Compose stacks. It helps users control, monitor, and visualize self-hosted containers and applications through configuration groupings and environment presets.
features: Docker Management: Control Docker Compose stacks through web UI. Visual management.
Stack Monitoring: Monitor container status and resource usage. Real-time visibility.
Configuration Groups: Organize containers into logical groups. Better organization.
Environment Presets: Manage different environment configurations easily. Flexible deployment.
Web Interface: User-friendly UI for container management. No command line needed.
Self-Hosted Apps: Perfect for managing self-hosted applications. Simplified operations.
Visual Control: See all your containers at a glance. Clear overview.
Easy Setup: Quick deployment for Docker environments. Start managing quickly.
